subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

PARIS HILTON -- OUT OF JAIL!
Paris Hilton
is out of jail; but what happens now? She isn't out of the
woods yet -- she is still on probation, and everyone is waiting
to see if she really is a changed woman! Was Paris treated
unfairly in jail? And given the cost and the media circus,
Showbiz Tonight is asking: Was this all worth it? The answers
to all these questions and more, tonight on TV's most
provocative entertainment news show.

PARIS HILTON
-- THE FIRST INTERVIEW!
On Wednesday,
Paris will do her first post-jail interview on CNN's "Larry
King Live." What are the tough questions she needs to be ready
to answer? Going forward, what image does she need to portray
to repair her image? Showbiz Tonight rounds up the experts for
advice for Paris.

PARIS HILTON -- THE TEACHER!?
Paris has received a million-dollar offer -- to be a
teacher! What could she possibly be qualified to teach, and
should she take the gig? The inside story tonight on Showbiz
Tonight.

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Paris Hilton out of jail: Do you think she learned her
lesson?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT.
